alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 21 at 3:31PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Fremont and Huerfano Counties, The Wet Mountains, The Wet Mountain Valley, Peaks of the northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, and Teller County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and periods of limited visibility, especially under heavier snow bands.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
